mapper.select: -- 先根据doctorId查出绑定的用户 -- 根据用户查询warning_info表, -- 统计完成的数量（status=1）和未完成的数量(status=0)，找到最小的level，最近的warning_time SELECT u.id AS userId, u.username, COUNT(CASE WHEN wi.status = 1 THEN 1 END) AS processed, COUNT(CASE WHEN wi.status = 0 THEN 1 END) AS unProcessed, MIN(wi.level) AS maxLevel, MAX(wi.warning_time) AS warningTime FROM user u LEFT JOIN warning_info wi ON u.id = wi.patient_id WHERE u.doctor_id = #{doctorId} GROUP BY u.id, u.username ORDER BY warningTime DESC
